instruction: My friend Derek admires Andrew Ng and wants to join his DeepLearning.AI as a course contributor in India. He has sent me his personal information and hopes that I can help him submit a job application. Please find a suitable job for him and fill out the application form, but do not submit it. I will do a final check. By the way, do not fill in the current location if any.

expected.name: Carl Derek
expected.additional: My passion for AI education stems from my belief that well-structured learning materials can empower developers and researchers to build more robust AI systems. I have experience in technical writing, instructional design, and explaining complex AI concepts in an intuitive manner. With my combined expertise in AI research and systematic benchmarking, I am eager to contribute to Deeplearning.AIâ€™s mission by developing high-quality, impactful courses that bridge the gap between theoretical advancements and practical AI applications.
